name: 32bit Jam 2022 - Pipoy's Adventure
description:
- A small platformer game for the 32bit jam 2022.

- Gamepad recommended

CONTROLS FOR GAMEPAD

- LEFT ANALOG STICK to move

- RIGHT ANALOG STICK to look

- SOUTH BUTTON to jump and double jump

CONTROLS FOR MOUSE & KEYBOARD

- WASD to move

- MOUSE to look

- SPACE to jump and double jump
